word_mean: 痘：发疹性或脓疱性疾病，尤指病毒引起的，见chickenpox， cowpox， horsepox， rabbitpox等

sentence.Network_en: A confluent small - pox had in all directions flowed over his face.
sentence.Network_cn: 天花打四面八方汇合拢来,布满了他整个脸孔.

sentence.Network_en: Your papa's got the small - pox, and you know it precious well.
sentence.Network_cn: 你爸爸得的是天花, 你知道的比谁都清楚.

sentence.Network_en: Girls are liable to other distempers besides the small - pox.

鸡痘（pox）是鸡痘病毒引起的一种急性，热性高度接触性传染病。病鸡以无毛部皮肤发生增生性病理过程，形成结痂、脱皮和口腔、 …

list.abs: 图(一) 病鸽之症状图(二) 巴拉米哥病毒之形态 2. 鸽痘(Pigeon pox) 由鸽痘病毒所引起,分两种病型:白喉型及皮肤型,其中白喉型主要的病变是在口腔黏膜.

山羊痘(goat pox)是由羊痘病毒属(capripoxvtrus)中的山羊痘病毒(goat pox virus,GPV)引起的山羊的一种高度接触性传染病.以发热、呼吸困难、流粘液性或脓性鼻液.

lj.lj_ly: a pox on both their houses!.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: alteration of pocks, plural of pock

entry.def: People sometimes refer to the disease syphilis as the pox .

means.word_mean: 1. a common venereal disease caused by the Treponema pallidum spirochete; symptoms change through progressive stages; can be congenital (transmitted through the placenta)
2. a contagious disease characterized by purulent skin eruptions that may leave pock marks
